Package com.example.project_3

package com.example.project_3
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminActivity
    AdminActivity acts as the dashboard/ homepage for any admin tasks like browsing and managing, Images, profiles and events.
    AdminEventDetailsFragment
    This fragment displays the details of an event in the admin interface.
    AdminTest
     
    Announcement
    Announcement contains information about the timestamp, content, and associated event name.
    AnnouncementArrayAdapter
    AnnouncementArrayAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter used to populate a ListView with announcements.
    AttendeeActivity
    This class represents the main activity for attendees, displaying a list of events and allowing them to open the camera for scanning QR codes and edit their profile.
    AttendeeActivityTest
    JUnit test class for testing AttendeeActivity functionality.
    AttendeeBrowseEventsActivity
    Activity for browsing and selecting events as an attendee.
    AttendeeEditProfileFragment
    Fragment for editing attendee profile settings.
    AttendeeEventDetailsFragment
    Fragment for displaying details of a specific event for attendees.
    AttendeeNewEventDetailsFragment
    AttendeeNewEventDetailsFragment displays the details of a new event for attendees.
    AttendeesCheckedInActivity
    This activity displays the list of attendees who have checked in to a particular event.
    AttendeesSignedUpActivity
    This activity displays the list of attendees who have signed up to a particular event.
    AttendeeTest
     
    BrowseEventImagesFragment
    this fragment is used to display a grid of images which are either user profile or event posters the universal app bar title is included along with the back button TODO: implement delete functionality once we have images.
    BrowseEventsFragment
    fragment is meant to display a list of events, Admin is able to browse through the list and interact with each event The events can be obtained from Firebase, each of the events basic details name, dae, time and location are shwon Admins can select an event to view or edit its details
    BrowseProfileImagesFragment
    this fragment is used to display a grid of images which are either user profile or event posters the universal app bar title is included along with the back button TODO: implement delete functionality once we have images.
    BrowseProfilesFragment
    this is used to display a lsit of profiles which are obtained from the Firebase Includes the appbar with the title and back button functionality Admins are able to browse through user profiles and interact with them through a list view
    BuildTest
     
    DownloadPoster
    This activity allows the user to select an image from the device's gallery and display it on the screen.
    EditEventDetails
    Activity for editing event details.
    Event
    Represents an event with various details.
    EventArrayAdapter
    Custom ArrayAdapter for displaying Event objects in a ListView.
    EventDetailsActivity
    Activity displaying details of an event.
    EventDetailsTest
     
    EventMapFragment
    This fragment displays a map with event locations and attendee check-ins.
    ExampleInstrumentedTest
    Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    FastBlurUtil
    FastBlurUtil provides a utility method for applying fast blur effect on a Bitmap.
    FCMNotificationService
    This file handles incoming Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) notifications and generates local notifications based on the received message.
    GridEventImagesArrayAdapter
    This is a custom ArrayAdapter used to populate a GridView with event images.
    GridProfileImagesArrayAdapter
    This is a custom ArrayAdapter used to populate a GridView with profile images.
    ImageGen
    Class for generating placeholder images based on text.
    ListEventArrayAdapter
    ArrayAdapter displays a list of event objects generates view items for each event in the list, the events have the names and their image along with a button to delete the event from the firebase
    ListProfileArrayAdapter
    ArrayAdapter meant to display a list of profiles, generates the view for each profile includes their image and their name in the list,
    MainActivity
    Main activity for the application, responsible for handling permissions and initializing the user profile.
    NotificationActivity
    Activity responsible for displaying notifications to the user.
    NotificationsPage
    Activity for displaying notifications received from Firebase Firestore.
    OrganizerActivity
    This activity allows organizers to manage events by adding new events, viewing existing events, and updating event details.
    OrganizerActivityTest
     
    OrganizerListActivity
    Initializes the activity layout and retrieves event name from intent extras.
    Profile
    Represents a user profile with various details.
    ProfileDetailsFragment
    this fragment displays the details of a selected persons profile this includes the persons name, socials, and contact info also the ability to delete the persons profile from the firebase
    PromoQRCodeDisplayActivity
    This activity displays the promo QR code for a specific event along with event details.
    QRCodeDisplayActivity
    This activity displays the QR code for a specific event along with event details.
    QRScan
    Activity for scanning QR codes and barcodes using the ZXing library.
    User
    Represents a user with a profile.
